data.name: Cosy Bedroom in Central London
reviews: Location ₪1,670 Show price breakdown for 4 nights ₪1,670 for 4 nights 4.98 · 157 reviews Rated 4.98 out of 5 from 157 reviews. Reserve Room in Greater London, United Kingdom 1 double bed · · Shared bathroom Guest favorite One of the most loved homes on Airbnb, according to guests Rated 4.98 out of 5 stars. 4.98 157 reviews 157 Reviews Stay with Isabel Superhost · · 8 years hosting Listing highlights Top 1% of homes This home is one of the highest ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability. Room in a townhouse Your own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces. Free cancellation before November 11 Get a full refund if you change your mind. We live in a safe area in the centre of London, and all areas in the city are easily accessible from here. Our apartment is comfortable and bright with high ceilings. It’s ideal for the single traveler who wants warmth, safety, comfort, and practicality. The space The bedroom is a good size double. It’s practical and very comfortable. The family’s bedrooms (3) are on a different floor. Guest access Bedroom, corridors, toilet, bathroom and kitchen During your stay We are always happy to socialise with guests. However, we are equally happy to give them privacy, and let them have a quiet time while staying at our place. Other things to note The guest bedroom is on the ground-floor, and the toilet and shared bathroom are on the first floor. We live in front of a relatively busy road, so expect to hear, during the day, a bit of traffic noise. Show more Where you’ll sleep Bedroom 1 double bed

name: Country retreat for long term stays _ gym access

data.name: Country retreat for long term stays _ gym access
reviews: Location ₪3,262 Show price breakdown for 4 nights ₪3,262 for 4 nights 5.0 · 3 reviews Rated 5.0 out of 5 from 3 reviews. Reserve Entire cottage in Balcombe, United Kingdom 4 guests · · 2 bedrooms · · 4 beds · · 1 bath Rated 5.0 out of 5 stars. 5.0 · 3 reviews Hosted by Silke 3 months hosting Listing highlights Self check-in Check yourself in with the lockbox. Unbeatable location 100% of guests in the past year gave this location a 5-star rating. Free cancellation before November 15 Get a full refund if you change your mind. Are you looking for a longer stay? Our guest house is a beautifully fitted out, self contained cottage set away from the main house, surrounded by lush gardens. Perfect for longer stays and ideal for creatives, it has private parking, a garden + access to a shared gym. Relax in the Japanese soaking tub, read by the bio stove or focus on your work in the light filled work/dining space, then sit in your private garden to watch the sun go down. (Suitable for guests who are less mobile, see listing) The space Our guest house sits at the top of our garden, adjacent to a barn which houses a pottery studio and gym/games room. It is a fully self contained building designed for longer stays, offering all the amenities you would need to cater for yourself long term: a fully fitted kitchen (microwave/oven combi, fridge, dishwasher, gas hob), bathroom (shower and bath) and utility (washing machine and tumble dryer). The wardrobe in the main bedroom is substantial and there is hanging space in the utility for the second bedroom which houses an adult size bunk bed. The generous dining table and cosy dining bench are lit up beautifully by a south facing skylight. Perfect for all meals but also to work, making use of the fast Starlink internet provided. The building is exceptionally healthy and calming, with natural, breathable clay plaster walls, solid oak surfaces, wood wool insulation, natural ventilation and plenty of light. Wooden shutters and sliding doors provide privacy and acoustic separation when needed. Underfloor heating ensures the building is comfortable at all times and a bio stove offers extra cosyness in winter. If you want to escape the big smoke, write a novel, compose a song, clear your mind or just enjoy hearing the birds sing, this is the perfect place for you! (Suitable for the less mobile, all rooms flow into each other with step free openings of 80 and 90cm respectively. A mobile ramp is available for the entrance step into the building and the parking space is generous. Assistance is needed as bathroom and kitchen fittings are not compliant but overall the building is very accessible.) Guest access The building is entirely yours during your stay, and so are the terraces (east and south) as well as the back garden, which is accessible from the main bedroom. We allow guests access to our gym with the use of all the equipment provided, including a Peloton tread, provided they agree to the terms and conditions prior to use. There is a separate pottery studio adjacent to the gym which is usually locked and for private use only. However, experienced potters on long term stays can arrange access and use the space and pottery classes for beginners can be arranged upon request. We offer a private parking bay within our covered garage as well as space for a second car within the gravel drive. The drive is secured by electronic gates for which a buzzer will be provided for the duration of your stay. We are very near the A23 (luckily not within ear shot) which makes us easy to reach from both London and Brighton (90 and 30 minutes respectively). Places to enjoy within a 10-15 minute drive are: - Bolney Wine Estate - Ardingly reservoir - Wakehurst, Nymans and Borde Hill Gardens - The Spa at South Lodge - Leonardslee - JoCo Balcombe (our local cafe, a good starting point for walks) - Country walks - Country pubs - and many more A 20 minute drive takes you to the beautiful South Downs. Balcombe Station, which is just 5 minutes down the road, has a car park that is free of charge on weekends but gets busy with commuters during the week. Trains to London run twice per hour. Other things to note We kindly ask our guests to use the garden dedicated to the guest house and not our main garden. You will find that there is plenty of distance between the two. You can make full use of the wrap around terrace around the guest house, including the large swing on our oak tree and the hammock outside the barn. Please refrain from using the small terrace outside the pottery studio as this is used as layout space for pottery items. If you plan to arrive by train and take a taxi to our address, please alight at Three Bridges Station. The fair will be around £20 and taxis are usually available outside the station. There are no taxis at Balcombe Station and no buses pass our address. You could cycle but local roads are narrow and dangerous for cyclists so we really would not recommend this. The nearest petrol station is Pease Pottage (6 miles) and the closest supermarket is Budgens in Handcross (4 miles). Sainsbury's, Argos and Waitrose are nearby in Crawley/Haywards Heath (10 miles). Show more Where you’ll sleep 1 of 2 pages 1 / 2 Bedroom 1 1 king bed Bedroom 2 1 bunk bed Living room 1 sofa bed
data.description: Are you looking for a longer stay? Our guest house is a beautifully fitted out, self contained cottage set away from the main house, surrounded by lush gardens. Perfect for longer stays and ideal for creatives, it has private parking, a garden + access to a shared gym. Relax in the Japanese soaking tub, read by the bio stove or focus on your work in the light filled work/dining space, then sit in your private garden to watch the sun go down. (Suitable for guests who are less mobile, see listing)

name: Entire Cottage in Crawley, Near Gatwick Airport

data.name: Entire Cottage in Crawley, Near Gatwick Airport
reviews: Location ₪2,802 Show price breakdown for 4 nights ₪2,802 for 4 nights 5.0 · 25 reviews Rated 5.0 out of 5 from 25 reviews. Reserve Entire cottage in West Sussex, United Kingdom 4 guests · · 2 bedrooms · · 2 beds · · 1 bath Guest favorite One of the most loved homes on Airbnb, according to guests Rated 5.0 out of 5 stars. 5.0 25 reviews 25 Reviews Hosted by Ye Olde Cottage Superhost · · 5 months hosting Listing highlights Great check-in experience Recent guests loved the smooth start to this stay. Park for free This is one of the few places in the area with free parking. Free cancellation before November 11 Get a full refund if you change your mind. Some info has been automatically translated. Show original Luxurious Retreat with Historic Charm & Modern Comforts 2 Bedrooms • 1 Bathroom • Sleeps 4 • Patio Area & Garden • Sky TV & Surround Sound In Multiple• Rooms • Games Room Inc. Pool Table & Dart Board Welcome to your private escape, a beautifully restored period home where heritage charm meets high-end living. The space Ye Olde Cottage – Historic Charm Meets Modern Convenience in Crawley, Nr Gatwick. Nestled in the heart of Crawley, Ye Olde Cottage blends timeless character with the practicality of modern town living. Positioned halfway between London and England’s scenic south coast, Crawley is a vibrant commuter hub with excellent transport links and a rich heritage. Key Features: • 2 Bedrooms, Spacious Master Bedroom with King Size Bed, Bedroom 2 with Double Bed. • Multiple TV's with 65inch in lounge with Dolby Atmos surround sound, inclusive of SKY TV. • Fully functional kitchen with mostly Smeg Appliances, including washing machine, dishwasher, microwave etc. • Bathroom with roll top Victorian bath & walk in shower. • Spacious dining room sitting 6 persons, great for hosting special occasions or fine dining. • Newly refurbished games room including bar, tv with surround sound, pool table & dart board. Show more Where you’ll sleep Bedroom 1 1 king bed Bedroom 2 1 double bed
